titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford Album Photographs
titlestmt.author: Daniel Hartwig

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.abstract: This collection pertains to the photographic sources used in the production of THE STANFORD ALBUM (Margo Davis and Roxanne Nilan, Stanford University Press, 1989). The materials are arranged in three series: copy prints, alumni sources, and negatives. The first series contains copy prints of many of the images in the final book; they are arranged by page number. The second series consists of copy prints and negatives of photographs that were loaned by alumni to the authors, but not used in the book; (images that were used are included in the copy print series). Also included are a few original prints and negatives and several accompanying letters. This series is arranged alphabetically by name. The third series consists of negatives of many of the images in the final book; these are arranged by page number.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: The images from alumni sources were loaned for use in THE STANFORD ALBUM; any other use will require permission from the individual alumni.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: The Stanford Album Photographs (PC0075). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: This collection pertains to the photographic sources used in the production of THE STANFORD ALBUM (Margo Davis and Roxanne Nilan, Stanford University Press, 1989). The materials are arranged in three series: copy prints, alumni sources, and negatives. The first series contains copy prints of many of the images in the final book; they are arranged by page number. The second series consists of copy prints and negatives of photographs that were loaned by alumni to the authors, but not used in the book; (images that were used are included in the copy print series). Also included are a few original prints and negatives and several accompanying letters. This series is arranged alphabetically by name. The third series consists of negatives of many of the images in the final book; these are arranged by page number.
